messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Gardening for kids?/sunflowers and  squirrels
messages.msgSnippet: When I lived in a different place, I had squirrels and birds.  I fed the squirrels, and they never bothered the feeders...this was not why I fed the squirrels
messages.messageBody:
When I lived in a different place, I had squirrels and birds. I fed the squirrels, and they never bothered the feeders...this was not why
I fed the squirrels though...I loved to watch them. Now we live in the middle of a Field so to speak. We have planted trees all around,
but since it is a far run (for squirrels) to our trees from the woods, we don't have any close. I miss them believe it or not! :)
Ann
